name: Showdown
tagline: An extensible Markdown to HTML converter written in Javascript
body:
Showdown is a Javascript Markdown to HTML converter. Showdown can be used client side (in the browser) or server side (with NodeJs). Check a live [demo here](http://showdownjs.github.io/demo/) # Who uses Showdown - [GoogleCloudPlatform](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform) - [Ghost](https://ghost.org/) - [Meteor](https://www.meteor.com/) - [Stackexchange](http://stackexchange.com/) - forked as [PageDown](https://code.google.com/p/pagedown/) - [docular](https://github.com/Vertafore/docular) - [and some others...](https://www.npmjs.com/browse/depended/showdown) # Get it... * **Download tarball:** download the latest release tarball directly from [releases][releases] * **CDN:** * rawgit: `https://cdn.rawgit.com/showdownjs/showdown//dist/showdown.min.js` * cdnjs: `https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/showdown//showdown.min.js` * **Bower:** `bower install showdown` * **npm:** `npm install showdown` * **NuGet:** `PM> Install-Package showdownjs` - [NuGet package here][nuget-package] # Use it... ```js //node var showdown = require('showdown'); var converter = new showdown.Converter(); var htmlOutput = converter.makeHtml('*Hello* __World__'); ``` Check our [wiki pages][wiki] for a more in-depth documentation, such as [syntax support][wiki-syntax-support], [examples][wiki-examples], [extensions][wiki-extensions], etc... [sd-logo]: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/showdownjs/logo/master/dist/logo.readme.png [releases]: https://github.com/showdownjs/showdown/releases [nuget-package]: https://www.nuget.org/packages/showdownjs/ [wiki]: https://github.com/showdownjs/showdown/wiki [wiki-syntax-support]: https://github.com/showdownjs/showdown/wiki/Showdown's-Markdown-syntax [wiki-examples]: https://github.com/showdownjs/showdown/wiki/Tutorial:-Markdown-editor-using-Showdown [wiki-extensions]: https://github.com/showdownjs/showdown/wiki/extensions [changelog]: https://github.com/showdownjs/showdown/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md ----------- # [Changelog][changelog] # Credits Full credit list at https://github.com/showdownjs/showdown/blob/master/CREDITS.md Showdown is powered by:
[![webstorm](https://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm/documentation/docs/logo_webstorm.png)](https://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm/)
